messages.title: Paul Ashby, you can make the difference
messages.content: Britain needs change. You will soon have the chance to make that change happen.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: David Cameron has made the NHS our number one priority - we have plans to improve the NHS for everyone: Conservatives will increase spending on the NHS every year. We will cut NHS bureaucracy by a third and get new money to the front line. Our new Cancer Drugs Fund will mean that everyone can have access to the cancer drugs their doctors think will help them.
Gordon Brown will raise taxes next April on everyone earning over £20,000 a year, and almost every job. Labour's jobs tax will kill the recovery.

issues.economy: Gordon Brown will raise taxes next April on everyone earning over £20,000 a year, and almost every job. Labour's jobs tax will kill the recovery.
issues.health: David Cameron has made the NHS our number one priority - we have plans to improve the NHS for everyone.

leaflet.personalStatement: However you may have felt about the Conservatives in the past, take a look at what we're offering today. Only the Conservatives can bring the change Britain needs. I hope you'll take the chance to vote for that change.

contactInformation.address: Paul T Ashby, 456 Ginglehill Road London NW6 7EL

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a photo of David Cameron, suggesting his endorsement of Paul Ashby. The focus on NHS and job tax suggests two of the central themes of the campaign.
